TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IButtonControl

Docs.summary: Defines properties and events that must be implemented to allow a control to act like a button on a Web page.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The IButtonControl interface defines the properties and events that must be implemented to allow a control to act like a button on a Web page.
The members of this interface provide basic button functionality, such as the ability to raise a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Click> event and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Command> event. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.PostBackUrl%2A> property provides cross-page posting functionality.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether clicking the button causes page validation to occur.
Docs.value: if clicking the button causes page validation to occur; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> interface must implement the CausesValidation property to indicate whether clicking the button causes page validation to occur.

Docs.returns: if clicking the button causes page validation to occur; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Occurs when the button control is clicked.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The Click event is raised when the button control is clicked.
For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

Docs.summary: Occurs when the button control is clicked.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The Command event is raised when the button control is clicked.
For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

Docs.summary: Gets or sets an optional argument that is propagated to the event.
Docs.value: The argument that is propagated to the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> interface must implement the CommandArgument property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> property to indicate the argument and command name that are propagated to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Command> event.

Docs.returns: The argument that is propagated to the event.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the command name that is propagated to the event.
Docs.value: The name of the command that is propagated to the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> interface must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandArgument%2A> property and the CommandName property to indicate the argument and command name that are propagated to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Command> event.

Docs.returns: The name of the command that is propagated to the event.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the URL of the Web page to post to from the current page when the button control is clicked.
Docs.value: The URL of the Web page to post to from the current page when the button control is clicked.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the PostBackUrl property to perform a cross-page post. If the PostBackUrl property is set to the page that the button is currently on, a normal postback event cycle occurs.
A control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> interface must implement the PostBackUrl property to indicate the URL of the Web page to post to from the current page when the button control is clicked.

Docs.returns: The URL of the Web page to post to from the current page when the button control is clicked.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the text caption displayed for the button.
Docs.value: The text caption displayed for the button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> interface must implement the Text property to indicate the text caption displayed for the button.

Docs.returns: The text caption displayed for the button.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name for the group of controls for which the button control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
Docs.value: The name for the group of controls for which the button control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> interface must implement the ValidationGroup property to indicate the name for the group of controls for which the button control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

Docs.returns: The name for the group of controls for which the button control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
